attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2013-0259

Date: 2013-03-07

Sur recommandation du Premier ministre, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que l’honorable Shane I. Perlmutter, juge de la Cour du Banc de la Reine du Manitoba, soit nommé juge en chef adjoint de la Cour du Banc de la Reine du Manitoba.


The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, advises that the Honourable Shane I. Perlmutter, a Judge of Her Majesty’s Court of Queen’s Bench for Manitoba, be appointed Associate Chief Justice of Her Majesty's Court of Queen's Bench for Manitoba.

The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, advises that the Honourable Shane I. Perlmutter, a Judge of Her Majesty’s Court of Queen’s Bench for Manitoba, be appointed Associate Chief Justice of Her Majesty's Court of Queen's Bench for Manitoba.
